overview:
Dan holds a significant and well-recognized track record in developing and driving profitable marketing and customer acquisition, activation, usage, product and market development, retention, and database strategies across a broad range of industries, products and channels.

Dan Stiel started his marketing career while a freshman in college working part-time as a marketing intern for Bank of America. Within two years, he along with several classmates, established a marketing services company called Ad-Vans Advertising, serving clients across the Southern California region.

After graduating from college, he sold his interest in the business and joined First Interstate Bancorp, where he expanded his expertise in product development, advertising and brand management, sales, and direct marketing.

Finishing more than a decade with First Interstate, Dan joined Tosco/Circle K Stores as the Director of Financial Services, followed by Visa as Director of Fleet Purchasing Cards before starting Stiel Direct LLC in 2000.

Dan Stiel is a graduate of the University of Southern California School of Business, where he studied marketing and finance.
